software: CHRISTCHURCH, NEW ZEALAND - JUNE 5: David Bain listens at the conclusion of his retrial at Christchurch High Court on June 5, 2009 in Christchurch, New Zealand. David Bain was convicted in 1995 for murdering his family and served 12 years of his life sentence. On his final appeal in 2007 the Privy Council quashed his convictions and recommended a retrial. (Photo by John Kirk-Anderson-Pool/Getty Images)
